website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor Technology's affordable DJ Slims offer quality Bluetooth-streaming audio paired with a flashy (and flashing) design.
pros: Affordable, with strong audio quality for the price
Streams audio, controls playback, and handles phone calls via Bluetooth
cons: Very stylized design isn't for everyone
Audio leaks out of on-ear design
No wall charger included, just a USB charging cable

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these while I'm sleeping. They are comfortable and the sound quality is very good; better than you might expect. Lightweight on your head. Can be adjusted to fit ears/over head. We would buy another if needed. We recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Great value
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are awesome. You can be a long way from the source. i would say up to 60' line of sight. i have played golf with them for several rounds. Easy to turn up, advance a song or pause with a glove on. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: I hate earbuds, so I needed something else
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal for working out. I hate earbuds, so I needed something else. These dont slip off, the pads are really easy to take off and wash, and they sound good
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff! Great technology, works well distance coverage is wide and hardware is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: pagiano

customer_reviews.title: but they're still nice for when you don't want to deal with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound started to degrade, so I don't use them all the time, but they're still nice for when you don't want to deal with a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Brigham Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Apparently fragile.
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty good until they died yesterday. Purchased in January, used occasionally, and never abused. I'd have hoped for better durability.
customer_reviews.author: Pax

customer_reviews.title: other then that i love them. i am a mechanic and wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: i can get 8 months max out of a pair of these.the right speaker goes out.i just ordered my 4th pair.other then that i love them.i am a mechanic and wear them 6-8 hours a day-5 days a week.i dont think they are intended to be used that hard,so that would be my guess why they dont last (for me)
customer_reviews.author: Al T.

customer_reviews.title: No volume control after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three years, now the volume control won't work. Cannot control volume at all.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Like your life now has a soundtrack
customer_reviews.text: I think this may be the best headphone purchase ever. I have had many wired headphones and I usually end up losing them or tangling them. These fit perfectly over your ears and it's like you won't even know they are there. I use them as often as I can. The best part is that while the music coming from them is great, you can hear if someone is hollering your name. When you walk you don't hear your every step. I really love them more than anything. Definitely better than the bluetooth tags they sell.
customer_reviews.author: krk2816

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Average sounding but function and features is what I was looking for and this product hit the mark.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBuys

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and best sounding headphones I have ever had. For $60 you can't beat them. Sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Furman

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and he loves them was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for husband. He wanted beats but these are just as good for a better price. Like the slim, light-weight, sturdy design.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C Woods

customer_reviews.title: Like their barely there
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so comfortable I forget I'm wearing them sometimes. I use them with my iPhone 4S and connect them to my stereo with a Bluetooth dongle. Either way they sound and work great!
customer_reviews.author: FlyingNematoad

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headsets for my mother she loves them. Lightweight and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: beth k

customer_reviews.title: Just a gift
customer_reviews.text: GOt these for my lady and she just loves them. She was a lil resistent at first but now that she has them cant live without them.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Irving

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is obviously not as good as our Bose headphones, but great deal and decent audio for price., these reasonably priced wireless headphones are perfect for our teen. Bright, colorful, no wires....almost makes doing chores palatable
customer_reviews.author: DValente

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. Easy to use features and buttons. I don't like the foam speaker covers. The move around and I can tell that they won't last very long. Doesn't stay in one place either....what I mean is if you look up they will fall back and vice versa. Not bad for the price though. Other wireless headphones fit better and stay in place. I work construction and wires always get int the way, get yanked out and just drive me crazy. Overall I give it a 3 star
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Draker

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones allow for a pretty decent sound for music but after about 30 minutes pressure on the ears can be felt.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Garlin

customer_reviews.title: Great and economical as compared to other "big brands"
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, good fit and reasonable price, what else is there to asked for? Just wished they had it in black.
customer_reviews.author: salamun bin ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Slim design, not bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because earbuds never seem to fit him correctly. He loves these headphones! The slim design and light weight make them ideal for him. He even wears them mowing the lawn and even though they're not noise canceling, he can hear the music fine at a safe volume.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its not that easy to use so I am still using my wired earphones mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the money, but i question the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Don_KC

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love everything about them
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love everything about them. Great battery life, moved to these from beats for working out and I don't think I'll be going back. Nice head feel that you miss when you take them off so I haven't lol. Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis David

customer_reviews.title: Speaker problem
customer_reviews.text: Headphones worked great fo three weeks, then the left speaker started fading and after a few days was completely unable to be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Keihol

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like them very much at first, but didn't hold. Had to buy new ones after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: kelly b

customer_reviews.title: The right headphone blew 32 days after purchase, one ...
customer_reviews.text: The right headphone blew 32 days after purchase, one day after they could be returned. These headphones boast about durability but they are very cheap and flimsy. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bellew

customer_reviews.title: Snapped at headphone/headband joint.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones- for less than a month. The band itself is indestructible. But where the headphone attaches to the band is an extremely flimsy design. It's supposed to move around a little to conform to your ears, but the pivoting mechanism is barely attached to the headband and it snapped right off during normal use! If you are planning on using these headphones for anything outdoorsy where you might say, crash or get them caught on a branch I expect they will immediately break.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Henry

customer_reviews.title: Lost sound after just one week
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a Christmas gift. He loved them and they fit under his bicycling helmet, but on New Year Day exactly a week after he started using he lost sound in one of the ear. I am returning them. I don't believe i products that break after one week of use
customer_reviews.author: KatyaG

customer_reviews.title: to expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality,, they fall off your head easily,but They look cool , ill use them till they break but would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: jeremy keyser

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones .... affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price. I am a runner and I can not stand ear buds. These stay on my head and sound pretty good. Very simple and basic design. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: The DJ Slims deliver great sound and comfort however, the rubber on the right ear keeps coming off and now I have lost it. I need to know how I can order extra replacements for the ear piece from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Clever gizmo
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is what I wanted, but I'm having no luck pairing it with my Motorola Bluetooth device. The battery charged in about 2 hours through my USB port. Now that I received a PDF of the manual that I can read, I guess the problem is with the Bluetooth device, or my virtual COM3 port, which seems to accept only incoming messages. I'm looking very much forward to experiencing this product.
customer_reviews.author: JOCR

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Tech Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. The headphones wouldn't sync to Iphone or IPhone so I took the gift back and ended up returning them. I wouldn't try this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Costantino

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: The go groove air band is much better and stronger bass but less comfortable and It's much cheaper than this outdoor one
customer_reviews.author: bbishun

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - headphones broke not usable within 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product - headphones broke not usable within 2 weeks - didn't send back as in Australia - wouldn't bother with these again - seller ok as quick delivery but product not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Maree Pell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset for listening to my iPhone apps while working out. Being cordless makes it a big benefit for me as the cords in prior headsets always kept getting tangled. Also, I tried several other brands of this same style and they all broke down after a month or two and this one hasn't. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Blew speaker on audio book
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were only fair at best. The sound was decent and the bass was as well. There is nothing special about them, just average. If you have a large head don't bother as they don't adjust much, most should be fine. I work in a loud auto plant so I had the headphone all the way up but I don't think the speaker should have fail on a audio book. The right speaker makes a cracking sound like the thin plastic that is in the speaker has come lose. I have to say I wouldn't buy these headphones again and I think all others should pass.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

product_meta.title: Outdoor Tech OT1102 DJ Slims - Wireless Bluetooth Headphones (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingOutdoor Technology DJ Slims feature oversized super comfortable ear pads, solid base, clean sound, built-in mic for talking on the phone/Skype, no wires and a price that even your favorite barista can make in their tip jar. Size is adjustable to fit a big dome or that chick from Beetle juice. Skip tracks feature so you can bust out of the stuff your significant other loaded on. Tough rubber coated exterior cuz that's just boss. Play/pause/answer calls so you can do all that. Get 8-9 hours of talk/listening time so you don't need to be that dude searching for a plug all the time. It has a 30-Feet range so you can roam free like the Yowie in the friendly confines of your studio apartment.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The DJ Slims are rugged, wireless headphones with a built-in microphone for hands-free call functionality. Tread the road that beckons, and take your music along. These headphones are all about low-profile, lightweight execution. The super-slim shape lends itself well to staying in place during your daily jaunt down to last call at Happy Hour, and the lightweight headband is coated with the same rugged, rubberized finish as many other Outdoor Tech products. Mountain-tested, office-appropriate. 100% business.

FULLY WIRELESS, FULLY PORTABLE.
The DJ Slims wirelessly connect with your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or any other Bluetooth-enabled device. They stream crystal clear audio for a range of up to 30 feet for 9 hours on a single battery charge. So yes, you can ride the teacups and leave your phone on the park bench, but your phone may get stolen and you will probably not get a date for that sort of demonstration. We take responsibility for neither of these issues. Your headphones will stay on, though.

BUILT-IN CALL FUNCTIONALITY.
When connected with your smartphone, the DJ Slims' built-in microphone allows you to make and receive hands-free calls from anywhere, any time. It's your dream come true, Hollywood.

THE SKY IS THE LIMIT.
The DJ Slims are really all about versatility. Sure, they are super rugged and will stay on your head while you preponderate the bumper cars, but they also will hold their own around your neck while you talk science, art and leisure over bleu cheese martinis. Do what you do, the Slims have you covered.

DETAILS, DETAILS, DETAILS.
 * Two 30mm drivers deliver the full range of clear sound, wirelessly
 * Connect to any Bluetooth-enabled device with easy one-touch pairing
 * External controls allow you to adjust volume, change tracks, play/pause and answer calls
 * Rechargeable lithium-ion battery
 * Built-in microphone, because you've got lessons to teach
 * Reconnects automatically to previously paired device
 * Minimal and attractive design, with adjustable sizing
 * Driver Size: 30mm-Impedance: 32 ohms@1000Hz
 * Play Time: 9 hours
 * Standby Time: 254 hours
 * Bluetooth Profiles: A2DP for high quality stereo sound streaming & AVCRP to control track and volume remotely
 * Wireless Range: up to 30 feet
 * Size: 6.3" X 6" X 1.2"
 * Weight: 3.6 oz
 * Package Includes: USB charging cable, and user manual
feature_bullets: Make and received calls with the built-in mic

specifications.Manufacturer: The Ketchum Group DBA Outdoor Technology
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars73 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
